Title: The Brainy Bunch
Writer: Michael Schur (created by), Daniel Schofield, Cord Jefferson (executive story editor), Andrew Law (executive story editor), Daniel Schofield (executive story editor), Kassia Miller (executive story editor), Christopher Encell (story editor)
Actors: Kristen Bell, William Jackson Harper, Jameela Jamil, D'Arcy Carden
Plot: Michael is forced to take drastic measures when his grand scheme hits a snag.
